alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 1:34PM CST until January 31 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Tombigbee River at Bigbee, Tombigbee River near Amory, Tombigbee River Aberdeen L & D... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Tombigbee River at Bigbee. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying agricultural land is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 15.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued late Saturday night at 145 AM CST.
